Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="AccountSync.UpdatePersonalAccounts" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Wcf"/> <Attribute Name="Procedure" Type="System.String" Value="AccountSync.UpdatePersonalAccounts"/> <Attribute Name="RequestId" Type="System.String" Value="##org.id##"/> <Attribute Name="ContractNumber" Type="System.String" Value="##ContractNumber##"/> <Attribute Name="CustomerTypeId" Type="System.String" Value="##CustomerTypeId##"/> <Attribute Name="CalculationMethodId" Type="System.String" Value="##CalculationMethodId##"/> <Attribute Name="PersonalAccountNumber" Type="System.String" Value="##PersonalAccount##"/> </Attributes> </DataSet>
